caption: Generate Key Pair
doc: Generates a new OpenPGP RSA 4096 key pair.

AAu.caption: Name
AAu.doc: Name to embed in the key pair.
AAu.name: name

AAv.caption: Email
AAv.doc: Email to embed in the key pair.
AAv.name: email

AAw.caption: Passphrase
AAw.doc: Passphrase used to encrypt the generated private key.
AAw.name: passphrase

AAx.caption: Generation Date
AAx.doc: Use the supplied date as the key pair generation date.
AAx.name: date

AAy.caption: Expires
AAy.doc: Number of seconds from the key pair generation time after which the key pair expires.
AAy.name: expires

ABw.caption: This action is an endpoint providing data in the element state.
ABw.name: hint
